results.content: Not much of materials, but the teaching style is super good and I am happy with the course
results.content_html: Not much of materials, but the teaching style is super good and I am happy with the course

results.content:
Probably one of the worst courses I’ve seen. The teacher clicks through the documentation and copy/pastes code from it to a html-file. My impression is that the Teacher just turned on video recording and ad-libbed talking and clicking through the documentation site.

When I am dissatisfied with a product, I usually keep quiet. But this felt like I was really robbed of the money I paid for the course, and unfortunately I can only recommend to stay away from it.

This is an excellent course, well thought out and excellently presented by John Elder - Highly Recommended. 
Adam Melhuish

results.content: It was a nice course to learn the basics of the framework.
results.content_html: It was a nice course to learn the basics of the framework.

results.content: The course dives deep into Bootstrap 4. However I would like to recommend to re-write completely Section 3 to match the current Bootstrap version 4.3.1. Some people may have difficulties trying to make the examples from version 4.3.1 based on the instructors screens based on the version 4.1.
